docs.lead_paragraph: THE shirt waist is the most democratic garment that ever was worn. It is the one style of waist which every one wears, from the fat cook in the kitchen all the way up through different grades of workers and non-workers to the fashionable women who dress upon incomes of millions and who represent the best style in the country.
